Menace, reach, haste
[i]Rivalry Unbound [/i]– At the beginning of combat on your turn, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards this turn, and as though they have flash.
[i]Cataclysmic Clash[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell during combat, Leo & Takumi, Rivals deal damage to target opponent equal to that spells mana value.
